Body: I am a group admin in a WhatsApp group. Yesterday IU deleted my group by mistake after 8 months and this morning I was added automatically to the group but not able to see anyone's name there, except myself, still receiving and sending messages in the group. My friends are also not able to see my name in the group list but they can read the messages written by me in the group, as do I.How is this possible?How could I get added automatically to the group? I was the group admin; could this be the reason?
Title: Members are not visible in WhatsApp group

history.Text: Group admin in whats app group. yesterday i deleted my group by mistake after 8 months and today morning  i was added automatically in d group but not able to see anyone name in d group , except myself, still receiving and sending messages in the group. my friends re also not able to see my name in the group list but they can read the messages given by me in the group, so do i .how is this possible ?how could i get added automatically in the group ,, as i was the group admin,, is this the reason ??
members are not visible in whatsapp group
